name: The Curse of Shadow House
blurb: Escape The Curse of Shadow House in this dark and mysterious homage to old school adventure games For iOS and Android

rewards.reward: Supporter!\r\n\r\nYou're preordering the game for your iOS or Android device and a Huge Thank You So Much!
Generous Friend!\r\n\r\nGet a downloadable copy of the adventure game, The Curse of Shadow House and an exclusive  desktop WALLPAPER for your PC, Mac or mobile device. Unbind the curse!

Curious Traveller!\r\n\r\nGet a downloadable copy of the adventure game, The Curse of Shadow House for your iOS or Android device, and the future two adventures in the trilogy. I will also mail you an original art print signed by me. A download of the original soundtrack and desktop wallpaper. In addition, as a special thanks, I'll include your name in the credits of the game.

Treasure hunter!\r\n\r\nOwn a relic from The Curse of Shadow House! An original, hand made necklace similar the one found in the game, with your name on the back. Plus all previous rewards.Include an additional $10 for shipping outside the US & Canada.

You are a true adventurer!\r\n\r\n You will get an Incredible handcrafted journal/diary as pictured in the game, Made from scratch by ME with an original sketch and special thanks inside, and signed and numbered. Choose from the Skull or Key cover. And the necklace as well! Not to mention all of the previous rewards. Check out the photo's to see a sample! Include an additional $10 for shipping outside the US & Canada.

Curator! \r\n\r\nYou will receive a beautiful 24x36 poster of Original art from the game signed and numbered by me, The handcrafted journal and necklace and you will receive all of the previous rewards. Include an additional $10 for shipping outside the US & Canada.

The Craftsman!\r\n\r\nSend Me a photo of something special to you and I will turn it into a key item to be used in the game, I will sketch It in your hand crafted journal, and you will receive all of the previous rewards. Include an additional $10 for shipping outside the US & Canada.

Immortal!

You Are in the Game!!! 

 Send me a portrait of you or someone you know and I will make you one of the characters in the game. You can choose spirit or living (1st come 1st serve as there will be 2 of each!) You will also get to name the character (no obscenities!) And all of the other fantastic collectibles as well.

Prepare to Die!

Not only are you the most generous of all creatures,   You will be immortalized in a painting As the Demon of Shadow House! The Painting will be displayed in the game, I will use your photo as the base for the undead vampire scourge of a villain who haunts the house AND you will get a very special hand crafted journal, a unique necklace, a unique 24x36 framed poster, and You will be forever remembered as the villain from The Curse of Shadow House. Plus The other prizes as well!

Not to mention, you will have my eternal gratitude.
